title: Video: Sonia Stein – Friendly Ghost
body:
‘i might as well / be all alone / accepting drinks from a friendly ghost’

Dark-pop music seems toy be all the rage at the moment, what with Rosie Lowe, Laurel and of course, BANKS dominating blogs at this moment in time.

The newest name to add to that list comes in the form of London songstress **Sonia Stein**, and her brooding debut, _Friendly Ghost_. With impeccable production, and a wistful, almost melancholic tone to Stein’s vocals, it’s immediately captivating. [(via](http://disconaivete.com/post/75622854186))
